name: DinoVaders
description:
✨ Story ✨

It's a Space Invaders clone which follows the theme of dinosaurs in space who want to reconquer the Earth. 

These were only on vacation and not extinct. That is why they are now attacking to recapture their home. 

The player now has the task of protecting the earth from the attacking dinosaurs.

✨A game from ✨

Anja Kortmann  (Art and Design)

 Lukas Klöck, Alexander Schyr, Cristina Nichita  (Code)
